member.name: IWICBitmapFlipRotator.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the bitmap flip rotator with the provided parameters.
member.param: The to flip or rotate the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFlipRotator
member.summary: Exposes methods that produce a flipped (horizontal or vertical) and/or rotated (by 90 degree increments) bitmap source. The flip is done before the rotation.
